amendment.description: Amendment requires the Comptroller General to report to Congress regarding the efficacy and benefits of uniformly limiting any commissions, fees, markups, or other costs incurred by customers in the acquisition of financial products.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 9 in part 2 of House Report 105-531, to commission a study by the Comptroller General of the United States regarding the effect and possible benefits of uniformly limiting the commissions, fees, markups or other costs incurred by consumers on the acquisition of financial products.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Sanders amendment (A008) Agreed to by voice vote.
